attributes.title: Yoga for the Bodies of the Future
attributes.description:
In this short video, taken from the Yoga Webinar 'What You Need to Know about Yoga' (http://bit.ly/28VLnXq), Paramahamsa Nithyananda speaks about the bodies of the near future and what kind of yoga is required for them.

Paramahamsa Nithyananda says that very soon, in the next 40 to 50 years, we will have a new kind of bodies happen. With larger brains, with deeper and more subtle brain grooves, with a higher capacity to grasp information, and who will be higher genders. Paramahamsa Nithyananda shares that Sadha Shiva has created yoga even for these bodies which are about to come in the future. This means that no one can develop on Sada Shiva!

Next, Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains about the three different kind of people teaching yoga. First are the people who are claiming to teach from their personal experience. Second are the people who know only the scriptures, but do not have personal experience – pandits, scholars. This second category creates less problems than the so called enlightened guru’s who do not abide by the scriptures. The people teaching from their personal experience are more dangerous for humanity than the people who are just abiding by the scriptures without enlightenment. Because the pandits and scholars will never damage you. The so called enlightened beings, because they get your trust and authority, they can cause serious damage in you.

Very rare third category, the teachers who have a very solid enlightenment experience, who are authorities, responsible for what they are speaking, and also completely rooted, centered on yogic scriptures. Those are the rare beings from which you should be learning.
